title: Steve Kornacki | Impeachment Bombshell Ties Trump and Rudy to Ukraine Scheme: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at two key impeachment witnesses tying President Trump and Rudy Giuliani directly to the quid pro quo with Ukraine and more fallout from that bombshell.

Then, Steve Kornacki talks about the impeachment of President Trump and the complicated political calculation Republicans facing reelection in 2020 will have to maneuver.

Steve also takes a few more questions backstage exclusively for this podcast.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
